briefTitle: Extension Study to Assess Safety and Efficacy of Mylan's Insulin Glargine and Lantus® in Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus (T1DM) Patients
officialTitle: An Open-label, Randomized, Multi-center, Parallel-Group Clinical Trial Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Mylan's Insulin Glargine With Lantus® in Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Patients: An Extension Study
summary: The aim of this extension study is to assess the safety and efficacy of Mylan's insulin glargine and Lantus® in T1DM patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) From Baseline
